# solana_genesis_hash (Data Source)

[(JSON RPC)](https://solana.com/docs/rpc/http/getgenesishash) Get the genesis hash of the configured RPC endpoint.

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "solana" {
  endpoint = "https://api.testnet.solana.com"
}

data "solana_genesis_hash" "gen" {}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- **block_hash** (String) The genesis block hash.
